00415 typedef struct {
00416     enum {
00417         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00418         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00419         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00420         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00421         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00422     } type;
00423     union {
00424         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00425         struct {
00426             UA_Connection *connection;
00427             UA_ByteString message;
00428         } binaryMessage;
00429         struct {
00430             void *data;
00431             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00432         } methodCall;
00433     } job;
00434 } UA_Job;
00435
